[File: aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/verifier/event_validation.rs] [Function: validate_emit_calls()] [Closure bypass] Does the PackClosureGeneric validation correctly handle nested closures and lambda lifting, or can attackers hide event emissions in complex closure chains? (High)
